Pre-Game Insights: Wales have won three of their last five games on home soil, including a 2-1 win over Croatia.
Wales are unbeaten in their last five home games, excluding penalty shootouts.
Wales are coming off a 4-0 loss to Slovakia, which proved the final nail in the coffin for Rob Page.
Turkey reached the quarter-finals of Euro 2024, their best tournament performance in over 15 years.
Turkey lost to the Netherlands in the quarter-finals, a game they felt they should have won.
